data.actual_result: the cursor is all the way to the left.
data.expected_result: padding for the left side should be normal
data.short_description: "[Ptb] - Message bar left padding is not correct."
data.steps_to_repro: - Use ptb - go to a message where you don't have the send attachments perms. (no button)  - see that your cursor starts way too far too the left.
